scripts.gen: yarn gen:createTypes && yarn gen:convertTypes && yarn gen:generateTypes
scripts.pub:core: git pull && cd ./packages/core && npm version patch && yarn build && cd ./dist && npm publish && cd .. && rm -rf ./dist && cd ../.. && yarn gitpush
scripts.pub:lab: git pull && cd ./packages/lab && npm version patch && yarn build && cd ./dist && npm publish && cd .. && rm -rf ./dist && cd ../.. && yarn gitpush
